entry.title: Roasted Relish Second Flush Darjeeling Black Tea
entry.summary:
Vendor: Golden Tips
Type: Black Tea
Price: 3.55 - 8.64 (2 variants)

At a distance of about 32 km from Darjeeling, Tinchuley is an offbeat hamlet situated close to the West Bengal-Sikkim border. With an altitude of 5550 ft, the name of the place derives from the words 'tin' and 'chula', which translates as 'three ovens' because the trio of hills constituting the hill station resembles mud ovens.

entry.title: Oolong Tea Full Leaf Pyramid - Tea Bags
entry.summary:
Vendor: Golden Tips Tea Co. (P) Ltd.
Type: Oolong Tea
Price: 18.00

An extraordinary Oolong Tea from Darjeeling, a go-between black and green tea having properties of both. Tenderly grown and expertly processed in select estates, Darjeeling Oolong Teas are made from finely plucked leaves, usually two leaves and a bud. This beautiful leaf tea type is semi-oxidized and abundant in anti-oxidants with several health benefits.
Each Teabag contains 2gms tea.

entry.title: Golden Broken Pekoe Green Tea
entry.summary:
Vendor: Golden Tips Tea Co. (P) Ltd.
Type: Green Tea
Price: 5.99

A high-grown Green Tea consisting of broken grades. This non-fermentated tea has several health benefits - making it an ideal cuppa. Brought to you in an economy pack by Golden Tips- Darjeeling's oldest and highly trusted name in quality teas since 1933.
Why Everyone should drink Darjeeling Green Tea Golden Broken Pekoe?
  • kills bacteria that cause stomach upsets.
  • High natural fluoride kills tooth decay-causing bacteria.
  • Contains catechins, a powerful antioxidant that mops up free radicals.
  • Has low caffeine content.
  • Helps lower blood pressure and cholesterol.
  • Has anti-blood clotting properties.
  • Helps in preventing certain types of cancer.
  • Helps in preventing UVB induces an inflammatory response.
  • Effective towards weight loss.
  • Several cups of green tea a day restrict the development of liver disorders.
How to Prepare
1. Bring fresh water to a boil and let cool till the temperature reaches 80°
2. Add half a teaspoon of tea leaves for each cup into the pot.
3. Pour the water into the teapot. Good water and proper brewing time are essential for a flavourful cup of tea.
4. Steep for 2-3 minutes. Stir well and then pour the liquor through the strainer into a cup.
5. Sweeten as desired with stevia/honey. Lemon juice may also be added.
6. Ice cubes may be added to chill. Milk should be always avoided with all kinds of Green Tea.

entry.title: Pure Chamomile Herbal Infusion- Tea Bags
entry.summary:
Vendor: Golden Tips Tea (India)
Type: Herbal Tea
Price: 3.09

Chamomile is herb that people have used for centuries. It is noted for its naturally calming energy and its ability to relax both body and mind. It is known to be a beverage which helps calm an upset stomach or assists in stress-busting and inducing sleep. The fruit-like flavour, similar to apple, makes the drink a delicacy. Can also be had with a dash of honey.

Select full leaf Tea, skilfully blended with the oil of
Bergamot with a fragrant, refreshing flavour. Earl Grey was popularised by the

among the creme-de-la-creme.
